message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am proposing to sell it to you for $10,000. This price reflects the value I place on your satisfaction while ensuring a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
